subSubSection.paragraph: Peniagone cf. leander In the "Atlas of Abyssal Megafauna Morphotypes of the Clarion-Clipperton Fracture Zone" created for the ISA (http://ccfzatlas.com/), this morphospecies is listed as " Peniagone leander Pawson & Foell, 1986".
